byline.original: By TRIP GABRIEL and SUSAN SAULNY

abstract: Republican presidential candidate Herman Cain and his proposal to overhaul the tax code are getting intensive scrutiny as Cain continues to surge in national polls; his proposal is little more than a sketch of what would be a radical and complex overhaul of the tax system, and it has drawn fire from both conservatives and liberals.
snippet: Herman Cain’s 9-9-9 plan for taxes is getting intensive new scrutiny as Republicans continue to flirt with their candidates.
lead_paragraph: Herman Cain’s 9-9-9 plan for taxes is getting intensive new scrutiny as Republicans continue to flirt with their candidates.

headline.main: With Just Three 9s, Cain Refigured Math for Taxes
headline.print_headline: With Three 9s, Cain Refigured Math for Taxes
headline.seo: Herman Cain’s Tax Plan Changes G.O.P. Primary Math
